Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.5f2b3759-6691-41e5-8e3c-00a7b2dbd806.description=Purpose\: Checks the status of the MySQL to ensure that it matches Desired Status in the input parameter. Description\: Check status of MySQL to see if it is up or down. Return Codes\: If status is equal to desired status, the step returns a 0, else the step returns a 2. Step returns 1 on error. DMA Function Libs Imports\: import steplog import pythontools import parametertools Inputs\: command - executes MySQLCheckStatus.py Desired Status - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.64c4e39a-ada2-4e8c-8c9a-a0b973dce16c.description=Purpose\: Accepts advanced parameters for MySQL Start or Stop and sets defaults. Description\: Set the default values for call wrapper and all the MySQL Start or Stop advanced parameters that are used in subsequent workflow steps. Return Codes\: If all parameters are valid, the step returns a 0, else the step returns a 1. DMA Function Libs Imports\: import steplog import pythontools import parametertools Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.69057fe0-0632-459c-9767-e8eaa414ff93.description=75a1a987-d350-4797-8536-d853a8d60e77.2c6d8c3f-72a2-4f7c-a59a-48e00083717f.description db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.b796a82a-6b48-486e-bea2-dbceece239c2.description=Purpose\: Accepts parameters for MySQL Start or Stop and sets defaults. Description\: Set the default values for call wrapper and all the MySQL Start or Stop parameters that are used in subsequent workflow steps. Return Codes\: If all parameters are valid, the step returns a 0, else the step returns a 1. DMA Function Libs Imports\: import steplog import pythontools import parametertools Inputs\: command - executes MySQLGatherParametersforStartorStop.py Action - Required - Must be "Start" or "Stop" host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Action - No description Finished Status - No description Starting Status - No description Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.d4e97483-d852-4731-a3c9-bf1f33fb7b49.description=Purpose\: Checks the status of the MySQL to ensure that it matches Desired Status in the input parameter. Description\: Check status of MySQL to see if it is up or down. Return Codes\: If status is equal to desired status, the step returns a 0, else the step returns a 2. Step returns 1 on error. DMA Function Libs Imports\: import steplog import pythontools import parametertools Inputs\: command - executes MySQLCheckStatus.py Desired Status - No description host - Target to run this command against password - Login information for host username - Login information for host protocol - ssh/wmi timeout - Time (ms) before auto-exit\: use ${ExtendedTimeout} to lengthen. Results\: Exit Code - Exit code of the step needed for branching. db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.dd543046-fec3-4b1f-8c24-91fef19f1656.description=75a1a987-d350-4797-8536-d853a8d60e77.322b9d1a-da29-4edd-8d6b-8d24f70309b8.description db3d4eb5-41bc-4cbe-86cc-e97735607db0.description=
 Usage instructions

Start or stop an existing MySQL daemon.  Action parameter must be set to either "Start" or "Stop" for the workflow to run successfully.


 Dependencies

Must target an existing MySQL instance.


 Results verification

Run "service mysql status" to ensure that mysql is indeed started/stopped based on workflow's outcome
 Required Inputs

    Server Target - The desired target to run this flow against.
    Server Target Username - The user to login to the Server Target as.
    Server Target Password - The password to login as the Server Target Username.
    Download Source Host - The target host where the files needed for this flow can be downloaded from.
    Download Source Path - The path to where the files can be found on the Download Source Host.
    Action - Required - Must be "Start" or "Stop"

 Optional Inputs

    Clean Code Base - Remove code base from target after execution (True || False).
    Clean JRE - Remove JRE from target after execution (True || False).
    Debug Level - Set level of output [(least) 1-5 (most)]
flow.name: MySQL - Start or Stop
